The first tree felled in the wilderness that lay to the south and west of the range of hills of which Hawk's Head is the highest, was felled by the two brothers Holt.
Robertson, Margaret M. (Margaret Murray), 1821-1897; Edwards, G. H. (George Henry) [Illustrator]
